verbose_text: Moreover, oral administration of PSA isolated from B. fragilis (of the Bacteroidetes phylum) was able to prevent EAE development via enhancement of CD103 + DC that converted naive T cells into IL-10-producing Foxp3 + Tregs, suggesting that antibiotic mediated protection is mediated the increase in Bacteroidetes.
evidence: PSA isolated from B. fragilis (of the Bacteroidetes phylum) was able to prevent EAE development via enhancement of CD103 +  DC
